original_text: Punishment never makes us happy at the time when we receive it. No, the pain makes us sad. But later we know that the punishment has taught us good things. It helps us to live in a right way that gives us peace in our minds. Punishment never makes us happy at the time when we receive it. No, the pain makes us sad. sentences.korean_translation: 징계는 결코 우리를 행복하게 만들지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: at the time when we receive it

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리가 올바른 방식으로 살도록 도와줍니다
